name: Logical Balls: Babble Breaker
description:
Good game to pass the time.

If you enjoy the kind of games with lots of jewels, gems or bubbles you will definitely love Logical Balls.

The point of this game is to remove all the balls from the playing field.
To do this, click on the arrow ball outside the playing field. The ball will move in that direction.
If three or more of the same colored balls form a group, they will disappear.

When the playing field will be cleared from the balls, the level will be passed.
